task_description: Navigate to the 'Clothes > Women' category and return only the name of the first product displayed by default position.
Purchase 2 units of 'Hummingbird printed sweater' (size M, color White) with bank wire payment and verify order confirmation page is reached.

url_match.description: Verify navigation to order confirmation page.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const heading = document.querySelector('h3.h1, h1')?.innerText || ''; const orderRef = document.querySelector('.order-confirmation-table .order-reference')?.innerText || ''; return (heading.toLowerCase().includes('confirmed') || heading.toLowerCase().includes('complete')) && orderRef.length > 0 ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify order confirmation message and order reference exists.

task_description: Navigate to 'Accessories > Stationery' category, apply price filter, and verify filtered products are displayed.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const products = document.querySelectorAll('.product-miniature, .product-item, [class*="product"]'); const activeFilter = document.querySelector('.facet-label.active, .active-filter, [class*="filter"][class*="active"]'); return products.length > 0 && activeFilter ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify products are displayed and filter is active.

task_description: Add product 'The best is yet to come' framed poster to wishlist and verify it appears in the customer's wishlist page.

dom_match.dom_extractor: [...document.querySelectorAll('.wishlist-list-item-title')].some(el => el.innerText.includes('The best is yet to come'))
dom_match.description: Check if 'The best is yet to come' poster exists in wishlist.

task_description: Subscribe to the newsletter using a unique email and verify the confirmation message is displayed (success or already subscribed).

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const text = document.body.innerText.toLowerCase(); return (text.includes('subscribed') || text.includes('subscription') || text.includes('newsletter')) && (text.includes('success') || text.includes('already') || text.includes('confirm')) ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify newsletter subscription confirmation message (success or already subscribed).

task_description: Apply promo code '20OFF' to a cart containing 'Customizable mug' and verify the discount is applied successfully.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const discount = document.querySelector('.promo-code-label, .promo-name, [class*="discount"]')?.innerText || ''; const price = document.querySelector('.cart-total .value')?.innerText || ''; return (discount.toLowerCase().includes('20off') || discount.includes('discount')) && price.length > 0 ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify discount code is applied and total price is displayed.

task_description: Place an order as a guest customer for 'Mountain fox notebook' using Check payment method and verify order confirmation page is reached.

dom_match.description: Verify order confirmation heading.

task_description: Create a new product named 'Premium Coffee Mug' with reference 'DEMO_PCM', price $25.00, quantity 50, category 'Home Accessories', and enable it for online sale from the back office.

dom_match.description: Verify the created product is visible on storefront with correct price.

task_description: Create a cart rule named '15% Off on Orders Over $50' with code 'SAVE15OVER50' that gives 15% discount for orders with minimum amount of $50.00.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const percent = document.querySelector('input[name="reduction_percent"]')?.value || ''; const minimum = document.querySelector('input[name="minimum_amount"]')?.value || ''; return (percent === '15' || percent === '15.00') && (minimum === '50' || minimum === '50.00' || minimum === '50.0') ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify cart rule settings: 15% discount with $50 minimum.

task_description: Navigate to Orders page in back office, open any order, and verify you can view the order details page with customer information.

dom_match.description: Verify customer information is visible on order details.

task_description: Navigate to Orders page in back office, select any order with 'Awaiting bank wire payment' status, and change its status to 'Payment accepted'.

dom_match.description: Verify order status changed to 'Payment accepted'.

task_description: Disable the product 'Customizable mug' from the back office and verify it shows 404 error on the storefront.

dom_match.match_value: The page you are looking for was not found
dom_match.description: Verify disabled product shows 404 page.

task_description: Update the stock quantity of product 'Hummingbird cushion' to 200 units from the back office.

dom_match.description: Verify stock quantity updated to 200.

task_description: Navigate to Orders page in back office, select any completed order, create a standard full refund and verify the refund confirmation message appears.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const text = document.body.innerText.toLowerCase(); return (text.includes('credit slip') || text.includes('refund')) && (text.includes('success') || text.includes('generated')) ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify refund success message.

task_description: Add a new customer from back office with email 'testcustomer@example.com', first name 'Test', last name 'Customer', and enable the account.

dom_match.description: Verify customer created with correct email.

task_description: Edit the CMS page 'About us' and change the page title to 'About Our PrestaShop Store'.

dom_match.description: Verify CMS page title updated on storefront.

task_description: Sort products in 'Clothes' category by 'Price, low to high' and return the name of the cheapest product.
Navigate to page 2 of the 'Clothes' category and return the total number of products displayed on that page.
Create a new order from back office for customer 'John DOE' with product 'Mug The best is yet to come', quantity 3, using Bank wire payment method.

dom_match.match_value: The order has been successfully created.
dom_match.description: Verify order creation success message.

task_description: Navigate to Orders page in back office, select any order containing multiple items, create a partial refund for one product, and verify the credit slip is generated.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const text = document.body.innerText.toLowerCase(); const hasRefund = text.includes('credit slip') || text.includes('refund'); const hasSuccess = text.includes('success') || text.includes('generated'); return hasRefund && hasSuccess ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify partial refund credit slip created successfully.

task_description: Compare three products: 'Hummingbird printed t-shirt', 'Brown bear cushion', and 'The best is yet to come poster', then verify all three appear on the product comparison page.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const products = [...document.querySelectorAll('.product-title, .comparison-product-title')].map(el => el.innerText.toLowerCase()); return products.some(p => p.includes('hummingbird')) && products.some(p => p.includes('brown bear')) && products.some(p => p.includes('best is yet to come')) ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify all three products appear in comparison.

task_description: Write a product review for 'Customizable mug' with 5 stars rating and title 'Excellent Quality Mug', then verify the review submission success message appears.

dom_match.match_value: Your review has been submitted and will be available once approved by a moderator.
dom_match.description: Verify review submission success message.

task_description: Navigate to customer account, go to Order history and details, open the most recent order, and verify order details page is displayed.

url_match.description: Verify navigation to order details page.

dom_match.description: Verify order reference is displayed on the page.

task_description: Add a new address in customer account with label 'Office Address', address '456 Business Ave', city 'Los Angeles', state 'California', postal code '90001', country 'United States', and phone '555-1234567'.

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const addresses = document.body.innerText; return addresses.includes('Office Address') && addresses.includes('456 Business Ave') && addresses.includes('Los Angeles') ? 1 : 0; })()
dom_match.description: Verify new address appears in addresses list.

task_description: Search for 'notebook', filter results by category 'Stationery', sort by 'Price, high to low', and return the name of the most expensive notebook in that filtered view.
